title: Instructional Design for Chemical Vapor Deposition Process Simulation Based on Virtual Laboratories

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Utilization of smartphone-accessible educational simulation tools for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain experimental design and data interpretation procedures using CVD process simulation tools
Learners can apply an iterative experimental design process for engineering problem-solving in virtual laboratory environments
Learners can quantitatively predict the impact of process variables (temperature, pressure, gas concentration, etc.) on deposition outcomes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
